feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: Fathom suffered himself to be persuaded by the arguments of the Tyrolese, who approved the proposal of decamping.

takePlaceAt.name: Discussion between Fathom and the Tyrolese

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: He was deeply touched with these marks of alienation in the behaviour of his friends.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: He was not a little confounded when he found himself charged with 350 attendances by the solicitor.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: He knew it was not his interest to disoblige his lawyer at such a juncture.
